short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple 'loop pedal' for Youtube, great for learning from videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take practice seriously --practice time is valuable!  To make it enjoyable learn and to make progress use practise master, a video tutorial extension for YouTube.  Practise and learn sports, music, almost anything --much easier from video tutorials.

Re-watch any detail of the pros teaching on YouTube.   Great content is endless, but ... can lessons move too fast?  Repeat sections of video tuition -- any number of times-- or loop the entire video without leaving YouTube.

Inside the YouTube video control bar, a simple time slider sets a video section to loop.  Expand slider to max length to stop looping.
